name: Repool
headline: Modernizing hedge fund back office software and services.
description: Repool makes it easy to launch and operate private funds, like Carta or Juniper for hedge funds. We build modern back office software and services to modernize and simplify launch, fund administration, and LP onboarding.

founders.name: Kevin Fu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO @ Repool | x@Vitally, @Troops, @Mapbox.  YC S21 & USC 2015 ✌️ - Philosophy and Entrepreneurship

# 
Modern 
hedge 
fund 
services 
&
software 
_to simplify launch_
End-to-end fund launch. Fund administration. Investor experience software. Repool provides modern hedge fund solutions to emerging and institutional managers.
[Get in touch](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/contact/>)
### The platform enabling the next generation of hedge funds
#### $ 0 +
Assets supported
#### 0 +
Funds launched
#### 0 weeks
Average launch time

### Member of
## Purpose-built infrastructure to amplify success and scale
LaunchAdminSoftwareInvest
### Fund-in-a-Box
Our flagship all-in-one launch and ongoing operations solution, covering entity formation and fund documents, ongoing administration, and compliance.
#### Launch Types
[Hedge Fund](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/hedge-fund/>)[Digital Asset Fund](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/digital-asset-fund/>)[Single/Multi-Name SPVs](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/hedge-spv/>)[Friends & Family Fund](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/friends-and-family-fund/>)
![](https://repool.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Launch-1.svg)
![](http://repool.com)
#### "The Repool guys have been great to work with. They're always on the ball so we can focus on fundraising and trading without distractions."
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='361' width='361' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

###### What makes us different
### Tailored service, support, expertise, and software
Repool is built by a unique team of experienced hedge fund administration experts and Silicon Valley software veterans with a deep focus on hands-on partnership.
What our clients love about us
Offshore support
US onshore support only
Paper and PDFs
Fully digital experience
Multiple counterparties
One unified team & platform
Silo'd expertise
End-to-end expertise
Commoditized service
Frequent new features
###### Repool Software and Services
### A suite of flexible solutions to serve the needs of hedge funds, funds of funds, commodity pools, and your most demanding allocators.
![](https://repool.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Fund-Launch-Icon.svg)
### Fund Launch
  * [Hedge Fund](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/hedge-fund/>)
  * [Digital Asset Fund](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/digital-asset-fund/>)
  * [Single/Multi Name SPV](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/hedge-spv/>)
  * [Friends & Family Fund](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/launch/friends-and-family-fund/>)


![](https://repool.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Admin-Icon.svg)
### Administration
  * [Hedge Fund Admin](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/administration/hedge-fund/>)
  * [Digital Asset Fund Admin](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/administration/digital-asset-fund/>)


![](https://repool.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Software-Grid-Icon.svg)
### Software
  * [Digital Subscriptions](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/software/digital-subscriptions/>)


### Built for you, whoever you are
Experienced fund managers and first-time emerging managers alike use Repool’s solutions to operate effectively.
### Looking for modern launch or backoffice solutions?
[Let's talk](http://repool.com/<https:/repool.com/contact/>)

Disclaimer
Repool, Inc. (“Repool”) serves as an administrator to various pooled investment vehicles. The content on this site, or any associated distribution platforms and public Repool online social media accounts, platforms, and site (collectively, “Distribution Channels”), is provided for information and discussion purposes only, and should not be construed as or relied upon in any manner as legal, business, tax, investment, or other advice. Repool’s services and information available on Distribution Channels are not a substitute for third-party professionals (including properly licensed and/or registered lawyers, brokers and tax professionals), and you should seek your own professional advisers, including legal counsel. Repool is not licensed to provide legal advice and is not registered as a broker-dealer or investment adviser, and Repool is not otherwise licensed or registered.
Any views expressed in posted content, such as articles, blogposts, commentary, videos, or social media, are those of individual Repool personnel or third-party authors and are not the views of Repool or our affiliates, unless explicitly stated otherwise. Additionally, with respect to any content or views available on Distribution Channels, Repool makes no representations that the information has been validated by independent, licensed third-parties, nor that such information has any enduring accuracy or appropriateness for any given individual or situation.
Laws and regulations applicable to the sale of securities, forming pooled investment vehicles (including private funds), and investment management (including serving as an investment adviser or commodity trading advisor) are complicated and occasionally ambiguous. Relevant law may come from the state, federal, or international level, and you may be under the regulatory oversight of one or many regulatory bodies such as, but not limited to, the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission. It is your responsibility to ensure that, when forming, offering interests of and managing any pooled investment vehicle, whether supported by Repool’s administrative services or not, you are in material compliance with applicable laws including obtaining any and all applicable licenses, permits, registrations, memberships, and approvals that are required in order to form, offer securities of and manage such pooled investment vehicle. You should not rely upon Repool in making any such determinations or as a replacement for licensed, third-party professionals.

Disclaimer
Repool, Inc. (“Repool”) serves as an administrator to various pooled investment vehicles. The content on this site, or any associated distribution platforms and public Repool online social media accounts, platforms, and site (collectively, “Distribution Channels”), is provided for information and discussion purposes only, and should not be construed as or relied upon in any manner as legal, business, tax, investment, or other advice. Repool’s services and information available on Distribution Channels are not a substitute for third-party professionals (including properly licensed and/or registered lawyers, brokers and tax professionals), and you should seek your own professional advisers, including legal counsel. Repool is not licensed to provide legal advice and is not registered as a broker-dealer or investment adviser, and Repool is not otherwise licensed or registered.
Any views expressed in posted content, such as articles, blogposts, commentary, videos, or social media, are those of individual Repool personnel or third-party authors and are not the views of Repool or our affiliates, unless explicitly stated otherwise. Additionally, with respect to any content or views available on Distribution Channels, Repool makes no representations that the information has been validated by independent, licensed third-parties, nor that such information has any enduring accuracy or appropriateness for any given individual or situation.
Laws and regulations applicable to the sale of securities, forming pooled investment vehicles (including private funds), and investment management (including serving as an investment adviser or commodity trading advisor) are complicated and occasionally ambiguous. Relevant law may come from the state, federal, or international level, and you may be under the regulatory oversight of one or many regulatory bodies such as, but not limited to, the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission. It is your responsibility to ensure that, when forming, offering interests of and managing any pooled investment vehicle, whether supported by Repool’s administrative services or not, you are in material compliance with applicable laws including obtaining any and all applicable licenses, permits, registrations, memberships, and approvals that are required in order to form, offer securities of and manage such pooled investment vehicle. You should not rely upon Repool in making any such determinations or as a replacement for licensed, third-party professionals.

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Repool**

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2021 and based in New York, Repool is a fintech startup on a mission to modernize hedge fund back office software and services. It aims to simplify and enhance the process of launching and managing private funds, akin to what Carta and Juniper have done for other sectors. With a focus on end-to-end fund launch, administration, and investor experience, Repool offers tailored solutions for both emerging and institutional fund managers.

**Key Offerings:**  
Repool’s flagship product, "Fund-in-a-Box," serves as an all-in-one solution for fund launch and ongoing operations. It covers important aspects like entity formation, fund documentation, administration, and compliance. Their services are designed for various types of funds, including Hedge Funds, Digital Asset Funds, Single and Multi-Name SPVs, and Friends & Family Funds. 

The platform also boasts features for digital subscriptions to streamline investor onboarding, making the process not only faster but also more user-friendly. For clients looking for an efficient, digital approach, Repool provides comprehensive fund administration without the hassle of outdated paper processes.

**Team and Support:**  
Currently, the Repool team consists of 11 skilled professionals, led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. The personnel combine expertise from hedge fund administration with the innovative mindset of Silicon Valley software veterans, focusing on hands-on collaboration with clients.

**Industry Affiliations:**  
Repool is affiliated with Y Combinator from the S21 batch, which validates its potential and innovative approach in the fintech space.

**Customer Experience:**  
Testimonials highlight Repool's effectiveness and customer-centric approach. Clients emphasize their seamless experience permitting them to focus on fundraising and trading, unburdened by administrative distractions. For instance, one manager noted how the launch process felt “anticlimactic” due to its efficiency.

**Market Positioning:**  
Tagged under 'fintech', 'SaaS', and 'New York', Repool is positioning itself to capture a significant share of the private fund management market by addressing the current pain points of fund managers. Its digital-first architecture and integration capabilities place it in a strong position against traditional service providers.

**Getting Involved:**  
For anyone interested in exploring modern launch and back-office solutions for funds, Repool invites conversation through its website. As they continue to grow and innovate, Repool stands to become an essential player in the hedge fund industry.

For more information, visit [Repool's website](http://repool.com).
